name: NFTshirt #000 "Identity Foundation"
description:
Unique Shirts on the Tezos blockchain. DTG Print on 100% recycled fabric shirt.

This Unisex Recycled T-Shirt is made from 100% recycled fabric & never re-dyed, providing a "vintage" look. 

Soft, comfortable, & environmentally friendly—this shirt is a must-have for all eco-conscious buyers.

Token owners are entitled to receive a physical shirt sent to mailing address only if provided by tezos profile linked twitter.

nftshirts.tez is a blockchain social experiment project.
							
To claim the physical token, owner must "redeem" their NFT by sending to crunchy public burn wallet—burner.crunchy.tez 
Address confirmation & proof of burn must be done through twitter via a 'tezos profiles' linked twitter account.
